page.title: 09A game that we know
page.content: {The Headland-H/pool By Steven Kennedy {And By Peter Smith Here is a game that we play in the school yard.It is called{'Heo'. When you play 'Heo' you have a 'bay', two equal sides or teams,and you spin a coin to see which side goes first. The team which wins the spin goes off to hide while the team which stays in the'bay' counts to 100.Then the'bay' team goes looking for the hidden team. When they are found you shout "1,2,3,Heo,caught!" They are taken back to the bay and when all of their side is caught the other team goes off and does the same.
